translations: 借调；借调人员（secondment 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Secondments abroad that are an integral part of a job based in the UK are permitted by HSMP, however they will be considered as time outside of the UK for settlement eligibility purposes.
sentences.translation: 基于英国的工作被借调到国外是允许多，但在定居资格审核时会被认为是在英国外的时间。
